about_the_game:
Digital Supporter Pack
We are pleased to announce you our official Supporter Pack.

If you enjoyed the game and would like to support our work, you can purchase our digital package, which includes:
  • Complete original soundtrack
  • Artworks, including original sketches and the official printable poster
  • 3 desktop wallpapers
  • 1 mobile wallpaper

How to access digital content
You can find all digital content in the game's installation directory in the "The Timeless Child - Digital Supporter Pack" folder (Steam\SteamApps\common\The Timeless Child) after the "Digital Supporter Pack" DLC completes the download.
